item.description:
I will be in the parking lot to the right of the (toll booth) picture above until 11:15 after that you can call my cell phone  860-208-7520 to find out where we are. there is a fee of $9.00 for parking. If you don't want to pay the fee I would suggest you carpool with some of the members.

bring chairs I am hoping to get a couple of picnic tables, but can't guarantee.

you should probably bring your meal I don't know if they allow grills. bicycling fishing hiking and swimming are allowed. If you bring a pet it must be on a leash at all times!!!

 

I will have maps of the trails with me or you can get online.
item.how_to_find_us: when you come in off Rt 85 you willl hit the park pay booth just past there on the right is a parking lot

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: picnic at Gay City State Park
